Amruth Kumar Balbail Yogendra

QA Automation Engineer
amruthbalbail@gmail.com

I’m deeply passionate about quality assurance and genuinely enjoy exploring, testing, and refining software to make it more reliable and user-friendly. I approach QA with curiosity and care, always looking for ways to improve how testing supports the bigger picture. For me, it’s not just about finding bugs but about building confidence in every release, collaborating closely with teams, and making sure the end user has the best possible experience. Quality is something I advocate for throughout the entire development process.

Experience

QA Automation Engineer

Juliahub Inc.

At JuliaHub, I contribute to QA automation efforts with a focus on end-to-end testing using Playwright and JavaScript. Working under the guidance of a Test Manager, I support the integration of CI/CD pipelines to ensure efficient and reliable test execution. My responsibilities include API testing, performance checks, and maintaining high coverage for regression and functional testing within agile development cycles.

November 2022 - Present

SEnior Software Engineer

Accenture Solutions Pvt. Ltd.

I played a key part in release management and quality assurance within the US Insurance domain, managing a small team and coordinating end-to-end testing efforts for monthly releases. I actively contributed to Agile processes, expanded my technical capabilities through API testing and a Cypress automation pilot, and ensured delivery of high-quality software by maintaining regression suites and aligning closely with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.

December 2020 - October 2022

Software Engineer

Accenture Solutions Pvt. Ltd.

During this phase of my career, I transitioned into automation testing, building foundational expertise with UFT and Selenium. I contributed to the development and maintenance of regression test suites by enhancing scripts, managing object repositories, and applying the Page Object Model design. By closely collaborating with the manual testing team, I translated key regression scenarios into automated tests, supporting faster, more efficient releases within a monthly Agile environment.

July 2018 - November 2020

Associate Software Engineer

Accenture Solutions Pvt. Ltd.

As part of a large-scale insurance project for the US market, I ensured software quality and compliance with domain-specific standards through thorough manual testing and detailed test case design. I collaborated with business analysts and developers to clarify requirements, managed defects using Rally, and participated in daily Kanban stand-ups to align on progress and priorities. My role emphasized clear communication, accurate defect tracking, and adherence to security and compliance protocols in a high-regulation environment.

December 2016 - June 2018

Interests

Outside of work, I enjoy staying active by going to the gym and taking walks. I also love exploring historical sites, which allows me to connect with the cultural heritage of different regions.

When indoors, I enjoy exploring subjects like linguistics, history, and anthropology. I also occasionally write informative articles in my mother tongue, Kannada.
